channel.title: Silent Hill News
channel.description: Latest news and updates on the Silent Hill franchise

item.title: Silent Hill 2 Remastered Announced
item.description: Konami has announced a remastered version of Silent Hill 2 for modern consoles.

item.title: Silent Hill Movie Reboot In The Works
item.description: Christophe Gans is working on a reboot of the Silent Hill movie.

item.title: Silent Hill 4: The Room Released on Steam
item.description: Silent Hill 4: The Room is now available on Steam, complete with enhanced graphics and new features.

item.title: Silent Hill 3 Soundtrack Vinyl Set Announced
item.description: Mondo has announced a limited edition vinyl set for the Silent Hill 3 soundtrack, featuring artwork by Sam Wolfe Connelly.

item.title: Silent Hill Homecoming Remastered Delayed
item.description: The remastered version of Silent Hill Homecoming has been delayed due to technical issues.

item.title: Silent Hill 2 Composer Returns for New Game
item.description: Akira Yamaoka, the composer of the Silent Hill 2 soundtrack, has announced his return to the series for an upcoming game.

item.title: Silent Hill 3 HD Remaster Cancelled
item.description: Konami has announced the cancellation of the Silent Hill 3 HD remaster due to development issues.
